wmndsDateInputProps.name: id
wmndsDateInputProps.description: Required. Must be unique. The id of the group of inputs.

wmndsDateInputProps.name: required
wmndsDateInputProps.description: If true, input is required/must be filled out. Defaults to false.

wmndsDateInputProps.name: error
wmndsDateInputProps.description: If true, error will be displayed. Defaults to false.

wmndsDateInputProps.name: errorMessage
wmndsDateInputProps.description: Options for the error message component. See errorMessage.

arrayOptions.name: id
arrayOptions.description: Id attribute to add to the error message span tag.

arrayOptions.name: contentText
arrayOptions.description: Required. Text to use within the error message. If contentHTML is supplied, this is ignored.

arrayOptions.name: contentHTML
arrayOptions.description: Required. HTML to use within the error message

arrayOptions.name: classes
arrayOptions.description: Classes to add to the error message span tag.

wmndsDateInputProps.name: formGroup
wmndsDateInputProps.description: Options for the form-group wrapper. See formGroup below.

arrayOptions.name: classes
arrayOptions.description: Classes to add to the form group (e.g. to show error state for the whole group)
